name: 林益辰
objective: 本課程目的在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。本課程授課主題包括：不考慮機率之決策問題、與機率有關之決策問題、獲取額外資訊之決策分析、效益分析、遊戲理論。相關之授課內容包括：機率分配、期望值方法、貝氏分析、完全資訊與額外資訊之期望值。
schedule:
Week 1: Class policy introduction
Week 2: Introduction to Decision Analysis, Modeling decisions
Week 3: Elements of Decision Problems
Week 4-5: Structuring Decisions
Week 6-7: Making Choices
Week 8-9: Sensitivity Analysis
Week 9: Midterm Test or Reports
Week 10-11: Creativity and Decision Making
Week 12: Modeling Uncertainty
Week 13: Probability Basics
Week 14: Subjective Probability
Week 15: Theoretical Probability Models
Week 16: Reviews
Week 17: Quiz
Week 18: Final
scorePolicy:
Participation and Attendance 10%
Term project: 30%
Oral Reports: 15%
Quiz: 15%
Midterm: 15%
Final: 15%
materials:
